meanings.definition: Of or relating to a hagioscope.
meanings.sent1: The hagioscopic window allowed a special view of the church.
meanings.sent2: The hagioscopic design of the stained glass added beauty to the chapel.
meanings.sent3: The hagioscopic mirror made the room look like a magical place.
meanings.sent4: Her hagioscopic vision of the garden made it seem like a hidden paradise.
meanings.sent5: The hagioscopic lens revealed hidden details in the painting.

meanings.definition: Providing a view of the altar in a church.
meanings.sent1: The hagioscopic window gave a clear sight of the altar.
meanings.sent2: The hagioscopic view from the pew allowed everyone to see the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The hagioscopic glass reflected the light in a mesmerizing way.
meanings.sent4: His hagioscopic perspective made him feel closer to the divine.
meanings.sent5: The hagioscopic opening framed the altar beautifully.
